t: Amazon launches a $4.99-per-month 'personal shopper' service for men's fashion | TechCrunch
s: September 28, 2020 - With Personal Shopper by Prime Wardrobe, an Amazon stylist selects an assortment of fashion items that match a customer’s style and fit preferences. These are then shipped to the customer on a monthly basis for home try-on. Whatever the customer doesn’t want to keep can be returned using the resealable package and the prepaid shipping label provided. At launch, the new men’s personal shopping service will include brands ...
